name: Wanderer
description:
Wanderer is a top down action roguelike where you play as a cat. Dive into the underworld with your sword on this random adventure. You will fight rats, spiders, slimes and other enemies who have stolen your sausage. You can also upgrade your cat to become stronger and get more sausage.

In the game you will meet:
-Lots of randomly generated levels
-In-game upgrades to get stronger
-Wonderful protagonist cat
-Lots of sausages

Wanderer will give you fun!
